events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because this is not what I purchased.
The issue has been categorized under 'Refund' as the customer is requesting money back for a wrong order.
Assigning the support agent responsible for refunds to handle the case promptly.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear you received an incorrect item. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number to proceed with the refund?
Attached are photos of the item I received, which is completely different from what I ordered. My order number is 987654.
Thank you for the photos and order details. We will initiate your refund immediately and you should see the amount credited within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and help. I appreciate the prompt refund process being initiated.
The refund process is completed on our end, and the funds will reflect in your account shortly. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
Yes, the refund appeared in my bank account today. Thank you for the excellent support and quick handling of my request.
Closing this case as the refund has been successfully processed and confirmed received by the customer.
